title: Episode 144 - Writing for Developers

text: Episode 144 Guest: Philip Keily 06 Jul 2020 | In this episode we talking about authoring books for developers with Philip Keily Comments Please leave a comment, positive, negative or just something weird. Philip Keily Philip is a developer, writer, and entrepreneur who works at the intersection of code and words. He has written for publications like CSS tricks, Smashing Magazine, and Twilio. He’s a recent graduate of Grinnell College and is the author of Writing for Software Developers. Guest Episodes: Episode 144 - Writing for Developers
html:
Episode 144 Guest: Philip Keily

06 Jul 2020 |

In this episode we talking about authoring books for developers with Philip Keily

Comments

Please leave a comment, positive, negative or just something weird.

Philip Keily

Philip is a developer, writer, and entrepreneur who works at the intersection of code and words. He has written for publications like CSS tricks, Smashing Magazine, and Twilio. He’s a recent graduate of Grinnell College and is the author of Writing for Software Developers.

Guest Episodes:

  • Episode 144 - Writing for Developers
